patterns: Hi
How are you
Hello
responses: Hi there! Welcome to the IT Student Helpdesk, I am the IT Student Helper Bot, how may I assist you today?

patterns: Bye
See you later
Goodbye
responses: See you later, thanks for visiting
Have a nice day
Bye! Come back again soon.

patterns: Thanks
Thank you
Thanks a lot!
responses: Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure

patterns: I can't log into my ctclink account
unable to log in to ctc link
cant log in to ctc link
i cant log into ctc link
i cant log into ctc
responses: Please make sure that you have already activated your ctclink account, else you may reset password or visit us for assistance.

patterns: can you show me how to activate ctc
I need help to activate my ctclink account
how to activate ctc link account
ctclink activation
i want to activate my ctc link account
responses: To activate your Ctclink account, please go to the Quicklinks section on top right of the page, click on 'Ctclink Activation Guide' and follow the instructions.

patterns: I can't receive the verification code for ctc link to do a password reset
I am supposed to receive the verification code in text message for ctc link but i am not receiving it
I am supposed to receive the verification code in email for ctc link but i am not receiving it
responses: If you are not receiving verification code for Ctclink, It could mean that you have yet to set up MFA before or your MFA needs to be reset. Please visit us for assistance.

patterns: I can't log in to my student email
I can't log into my student email
Im a new student and was given a temporary password to log in to my email but it is not working
responses: If you are a new student, please log in using temporary password ( 9-digit Ctclink id followed by 6-digit date of birth in MMDDYY format), then proceed to set up a new password that is at least 12 characters long.

patterns: I need help to log in to my student email because my authenticator app is not working
I just got a new phone and my microsoft authenticator app is not working
I just changed a new phone and my microsoft authenticator app is not working
I just got a new phone number and my microsoft authenticator app is not working
I just changed a new phone number and my microsoft authenticator app is not working
I cant get the code for microsoft authenticator app
authenticator app is not working
authentication app is not working
microsoft authenticator app is not working
microsoft authentication app is not working
new phone
new phone number
responses: Please vist us for more assistance regarding your Microsoft authenticator app.

patterns: i forgot my ctc link id
what is my ctc link id
how to find my ctc link id
i want to look up my ctc link id
i want to know my ctc link id
find ctc link id
responses: Unfortunately, there is no way for you to self look up Ctclink id. Please visit us for assistance.

patterns: i forgot what is my student email
i want to find my student email
i want to know my student email
how to find my student email
find me my student email
responses: To look up your student email, please use 'Student Email Lookup' located at the Quicklinks section on top right of the page.

patterns: I need help to reset my password
I want to reset my password
I want to change my password
I can't change my password
I can't reset my password
responses: Please visit us for assistance.

patterns: I cant log in to canvas
My canvas is not working
responses: Please log in to your student email to troubleshoot your issue, if you are able to log in to your email but not canvas, please contact e-learning at elearning@greenriver.edu regarding your issue. Otherwise, visit us for assistance.

patterns: i want to know more about running start program
i am a running start student and i want to enroll in college
i have questions about running start
responses: Please reach out to the Running Start office regarding your issue. More information can be found here: https://www.greenriver.edu/students/academics/running-start/

patterns: i have questions about financial aid
i want to apply for financial aid
i need help with financial aid issue
i am a veteran and i need help with financial aid
financial aid
responses: Please reach out to the Financial Aid office regarding your issue. More information can be found here: https://www.greenriver.edu/students/pay-for-college/financial-aid/

patterns: i want to pay my tuition fee
how do i pay for tuition fee
tuition fee
responses: Please reach out to the Cashiers's Office regarding your issue. More information can be found here: https://www.greenriver.edu/campus/hours/

patterns: i want to get my transcript
how do i get my transcript
transcript
official transcript
unofficial transcript
responses: Please visit Office of the Registrar to retrieve your official transcript. To retrive unofficial transcript, you may go to your Ctclink account.

patterns: how can i borrow laptop
where can i borrow laptop
how can i borrow hotspot
where can i borrow hotspot
wifi hotspot
how can i borrow webcam
where can i borrow webcam
responses: Please visit the Circulation Desk located at Holman Library ground floor or email them at circdesk@greenriver.edu

patterns: my temporary password is not working
i cant log in to email using my temporary password
i was given a temporary password but it is not working
responses: Please visit us for assistance.

patterns: I need help please
please help me
help
responses: Sure, what can I do for you? Please describe the problem.
